#summary Roadmap for Mini Max Platform

= Introduction =
Mini Max is a small version of Maxwell, based on an iRobot Create, Kinect, ArbotiX2 and AX-12 based arm. The platform is open source.

<img src="https://vanadium-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/mini-max.jpg" width="240">
